previous.excerpt: dLinks lets you build a decentralized profile on Web 3.0 in seconds. Built using Handshake and Sia: Handshake names are decentralized domains that no one can block access to. Skynet offers decentralized backend hosting that cannot be taken down.
previous.title: dLinks - An easy to use, no-code site builder for Web 3.0

localize.description: dLinks允许您在几秒钟内在Web 3.0上构建分散配置文件。使用握手和SIA：握手名称是分散的域，任何人都不能通过挡路访问。天网提供无法关闭的分散式后端托管。
localize.tagline: 一个易于使用的、无代码的Web3.0站点生成器

localize.description: dLinks允許您在幾秒鐘內在Web 3.0上構建分散配置文件。使用握手和SIA：握手名稱是分散的域，任何人都不能通過擋路訪問。天網提供無法關閉的分散式後端託管。
localize.tagline: 一個易於使用的、無代碼的Web3.0站點生成器

next.excerpt: Chocolate is sweet but SaaS surprises are sweeter - and we have two a day! At the stroke of midnight SaaS Advent Calendar unlocks an exclusive deal from well-established SaaS companies as well as a free SaaS in beta that needs valuable feedback.
next.title: SaaS Advent Calendar 2020 - SaaSanta is coming to town and he's not bringing coal

localize.description: 巧克力是甜的，但SaaS惊喜更甜-我们每天吃两个！午夜钟声敲响之际，SaaS Advent Calendar解锁了来自知名SaaS公司的独家交易，以及需要宝贵反馈的免费测试版SaaS。
localize.tagline: 萨亚圣诞老人要来镇上，他不会带煤来

localize.description: 巧克力是甜的，但SaaS驚喜更甜-我們每天喫兩個！午夜鐘聲敲響之際，SaaS Advent Calendar解鎖了來自知名SaaS公司的獨家交易，以及需要寶貴反饋的免費測試版SaaS。
localize.tagline: 薩亞聖誕老人要來鎮上，他不會帶煤來
